casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
JUAN C. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 15, 2017

Glenn W. Falk, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Matthew A. Weiner, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 185, 154 A.3d 39 (2017), is denied.
